title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.22 - Administrative notice of city board records and reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.22 - Administrative notice of city board records and reports

State Regulations

The appeal board may, in its discretion, consider in the
determination of an appeal any official records or reports on file with the
city board which relate to the appeal; provided, however, that not later than
the 15th day after the date of filing of the last filed appeal paper and prior
to the consideration of such records or reports, the appeal board shall file an
order (a) advising the parties as to which records or reports it intends to
consider; (b) permitting the parties an opportunity to examine and copy them; and (c) setting a date by which the parties must submit any affidavits, memoranda or other papers concerning such records or reports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
